name: Tori Note
description:
Let's make some great music together with our musician birds!

You are a traveling musician sparrow.
Put some food and goodies in the square and call in the unique musicians' sparrows!

▼Let's meet all kinds of birds!

Birds that come to play in the square spend their time freely, relaxing with goods and playing their favorite instruments.

When you swing the baton, they will play along with the BGM.
Enjoy the ensemble of birds gathered here!


▼Share by invitation!
When you make an invitation, you can share the state of the square on SNS.
And even hold a gorgeous concert with a dedicated stage set up...!
Share lots of invitations to your wonderful concerts!


▼Let's have a session at the concert!
When you receive a shared invitation, you can go to the concert.
At the concert, you can change the performing members, add a wonderful performance, and so on.

You can make it even more gorgeous and share it with others.
Please try to create a wonderful concert by decorating the invitations you receive.


◇[Tori Note] is recommended for
- People who like Neko Atsume
- People who like cute characters
- People who are not good at action games
- Those who are looking for games that can be played in their daily skimming time
- A lover of birds
- Looking for free games to play


*Note*.
This game application can be enjoyed for free until the end, but it contains some paid contents.


It is recommended to play the game with the silent mode or mute setting unchecked.
